remarks: Substitution of a setvar variable for another setvar variable in a 3-conjunct formula.  Derived automatically from ~ sbcoreleleqVD . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 31-Dec-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sbcoreleleq $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / y ]. ( x e. y \/ y e. x \/ x = y ) <-> ( x e. A \/ A e. x \/ x = A ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
